1. djWasabi.config¶

All function related to configuration. Reading files or environment variables.

djWasabi.config.combineConfig(default=None, config=None)[source]¶

Override the default with the configuration.

Parameters

  • default (dict) – The default configuration we will override.

  • config (dict) – The information

Return type

dict

Returns

The combination of the default and overriden config.

djWasabi.config.getRepository(config=None, name=None, default=None)[source]¶

Get the correct configuration for the repository.

Parameters

  • default (dict) – The default configuration we will override.

  • config (list) – The compleet repository list.

  • name (str) – The name of the current repository we want to find.

Return type

dict

Returns

The combination of the default and overriden config.

djWasabi.config.readConfig(rootPath=None)[source]¶

Will read the configuration file and return the content.

Return type

dict

Returns

The content of the configuration file.

djWasabi.config.readOsEnv(key=None)[source]¶

Will get the value for the provided environment variable..

Parameters

key (str) – The name of the environment variable.

Return type

str

Returns

When exist, the value for environment variable.
